titles: The purgacion of the ryght honourable lord Wentworth concerning the crime layde to his charge, made the. x. of Ianuarie. Anno. M.D.L.viii.
author: Marckant, John.

publisher: By Owen Rogers, dwellyng in Smithfield,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
